alert.note: Alert for Elkhead and Park Mountains (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued January 03 at 3:07AM MST until January 06 at 11:00PM MST by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY MORNING THROUGH THURSDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Periods of moderate to heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 12 to 24 inches possible. Winds could gust as high as 55 mph above timberline. * WHERE...Elkhead and Park Mountains. * WHEN...From Tuesday morning through Thursday evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. A detailed map of the snowfall can be found at: www.weather.gov/gjt/winter.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
